channel.title: Pentavalent Vaccine on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Pentavalent Vaccine on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Co-administration of live measles and yellow fever vaccines and inactivated pentavalent vaccines is associated with increased mortality compared with measles and yellow fever vaccines only. An observational study from Guinea-Bissau
item.description: Children who received a pentavalent vaccine (diphtheria/tetanus/pertussis/Hib/hepatitis B), in addition to measles and yellow fever vaccines, died 7.7 times more often than the children who did not receive a pentavalent vaccine. In this lecture Susan Humphries explains why the combination of live and killed vaccines leads to this effect.
